before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"5k3qo","text":"Turn on and chill centrifuge to 4℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f501b","text":"Prepare all the reagents needed on ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ir59","text":"Clean glass slides with ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"buiaq","text":"Gather the dounce, pestles, and scalpels on ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s9b7","text":"Solutions to make fresh before starting experiment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf2gm","text":"Nuclei EZ lysis buffer -- Pour 12 mL of buffer into the dounce and reserve 1 mL for wetting down the sides of the dounce","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2o9p","text":"PBSA + i (1% BSA and 1 U/µL RNase inhibitor in 1X PBS) -- For powder BSA, add 0.01 g of BSA per 1 mL of 1X PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dhkh","text":"G30: (Mix the G60 and GD together thoroughly before adding the GH)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5mbi1","text":"Isolation of nuclei from fresh-frozen brain tissue from sets of multiple (typically 2-20) human donors for analysis as a “cell village” (Wells et al., PMID 36796362) in which nuclei from all donors are analyzed together. Adapted from dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bs99nh96, Luciano G Martelotto, with modifications to optimize for human brain tissue and allow the “cell village” approach.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":137,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":156,"length":8}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FB96A2B4596411EEB2FA0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36796362"}}}}
keywords: fresh-frozen nuclei,nuclei extraction,snRNAseq,RNAseq,human tissue,brain tissue,multiple donors

{"blocks":[{"key":"dsp58","text":"Turn on and chill centrifuge to 4℃","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f81jp","text":"Prepare all the reagents needed on ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fe296","text":"Clean glass slides with ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95go6","text":"Gather the dounce, pestles, and scalpels on ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f0uf9","text":"Solutions to make fresh before starting experiment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8okrd","text":"Nuclei EZ lysis buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ti5s","text":"Pour 12 mL of buffer into the dounce and reserve 1 mL for wetting down the sides of the {"blocks":[{"key":"4mnqm","text":"Wet a 20 µm vacuum filter with 1 mL of PBSA + i","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e76rh","text":"On a glass slide on dry ice, shave off pieces of tissue with a scalpel until you have 50±3 mg of tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":17,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6ov4u","text":"For managing tissue, use OCT to adhere tissue to glass slide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2r6hh","text":"Transfer all tissue to dounce filled with Nuclei EZ Lysis Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffeie","text":"Gently dounce tissue on ice 20 times with pestle “A” then 20 times with pestle “B” until the tissue is homogenized","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eaa22","text":"Incubate on ice for 10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tuih","text":"Use 1mL of the reserved Nuclei EZ Lysis Buffer to wet down the side of the dounce if tissue is stuck on the side of the dounce","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjahc","text":"Place tissue pieces on a boat on dry ice. Hold the tissue on dry ice until all tissue has been cut","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"co9km","text":"Vacuum filter the homogenized tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8t3a8","text":"Transfer the homogenized tissue to (3) 5 mL tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9j9a9","text":"If the filter clogs, remove any unfiltered volume with a pipette, replace the filter, and continue filtering","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9vssc","text":"Centrifuge the samples at 4℃ for 5 min (500 x g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2mt1n","text":"Remove and discard the supernatant (be careful not to disturb cell pellets) and resuspend each pellet in 900 µL G30 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"888se","text":"Alternatively, split pellet into (9) 1.5 mL tubes (total), resuspend each pellet in 300 µL of G30, then underlay each sample with 1 mL of G30","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"an8le","text":"Gently underlay each 5mL tube with 3 mL G30 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8e48m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i3e","text":"Place the pipette tip filled with G30 at the bottom of the 5mL tube. Slowly dispense G30 underneath the cell suspension. A clear separation will form between homogenate and G30 (cloudy on top, clear on the bottom). Do not disturb the separation between the layers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ddntt","text":"Centrifuge the samples at 4℃ for 10 min (4,255 x g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dqvdr","text":"For capturing smaller cell types, spin at 8,000 x g for 20 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1up7s","text":"Remove and discard the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpotr","text":"Remove the top (very viscous) layer from the tube first- this layer contains fats and must be removed before removing the rest of the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"853qj","text":"Resuspend the pellets in 1 mL PBSA + i","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4rvia","text":"Centrifuge the samples at 4℃ for 5 min (500 x g) (single wash)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ai759","text":"Remove the supernatant and resuspend the pellets in 200 - 1,000 µL of PBSA + i (depending on the size of the pellet)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eehcl","text":"Count nuclei using LUNA-FL counter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d33uk","text":"Optional if you have excess nuclei, or if you need to pause before continuing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eq8ts","text":"Centrifuge the nuclei at 4℃ for 5 min (500 x g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"buepb","text":"Remove the supernatant and resuspend the nuclei in CryoStor (CryoStor® CS10), mix by pipetting ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8bb10","text":"≤ 1k nuclei / µL of CryoStor","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2bnse","text":"Transfer the nuclei to cryotubes and store them in a Mr Frosty in a -80℃ freezer until frozen (1 day)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80fcl","text":"For long term storage, transfer cryotubes to regular storage in a -80℃ freezer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a7jd7","text":"Thaw the CryoStored nuclei","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"edck0","text":"Centrifuge the nuclei at 4°C for 10 min (1200 x g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5s9qm","text":"Remove the supernatant and resuspend in 1mL PBSA + i","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6ahct","text":"Centrifuge the nuclei at 4°C for 5 min (500 x g) (single wash)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"442mv","text":"Remove the supernatant and resuspend the pelleted nuclei in PBSA + i","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"43il8","text":"Count the nuclei before proceeding to next steps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Village Nuclei Isolation With Optiprep
